price: Andolsun biz Musa'ya, belki onlar hidayeti bulurlar diye kitabı verdik.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَى ٱلۡكِتَٰبَ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَهۡتَدُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā al-kitāba laʿallahum yahtadūna
